column6: Gather herbs for your mother who is preparing dinner

column1: Question 3: Your cousin has given you a very embarrassing nickname and, even worse, likes to call you it in front of your friends. You asked him to stop, but he finds it very amusing to watch you blush
column4: Beat up your cousin, then tell him that if he ever calls you that nickname again, you will bloody him worse than this time
column6: Make up a story that makes your nickname a badge of honor instead of something humiliating
column8: Make up an even more embarrassing nickname for him and use it constantly until he learns his lesson

column1: Question 4: There is a lot of heated discussion at the local tavern over a group of people called 'Telepaths'. They have been hired by certain City-State kings. Rumor has it these Telepaths read a person's mind and tell their lord whether a follower is telling the truth or not
column4: This is a terrible practice. A person's thoughts are his own and no one, not even a king, has the right to make such an invasion into another human's mind
column6: Loyal followers to the king have nothing to fear from a Telepath. It is important to have a method of finding assassins and spies before it is too late
column8: In these times, it is a necessary evil. Although you do not necessarily like the idea, a Telepath could have certain advantages during a time of war or in finding someone innocent of a crime
